title: Walk Slowly - Novel Updates
author: 一笑绝尘
description:
When he saw him for the first time, he pointed at the building in front of him and said, “The design of this building is very beautiful, but I feel like it’s not very practical.”

When he saw him for the second time, he learned that it was him who designed that building. So, he apologized for his previous comment.

When he saw him for the third time, he was conquered by his talent and never looked away again..  >
